Title: Classic cola
Subtitle: Fizzy and tasty
Desc: The classic carbonated fiz you love
P1: For over 50 years classic cola has been quenching your thirst in style, refreshing, exciting and with an unmistakable taste, you know it, you love it.
P2: An instantly recognisable and widely enjoyed pick-me-up classic cola is a brilliant choice for when you want something you know you'l love.
P3: Sold in over 130 countries, a can of classic cola is a worldwide favourite.
